text: Aww yeah! You asked for it, and you got it!
Today we are bringing you another Harry Potter lesson,
and this time we'll be learning with the Potion Master at Hogwarts, Professor Severus Snape.

In fantasy stories, potions are liquids that
are put inside of bottles such as this one
and that have magical effects for the person who drinks it.
So, this is how you'll learn with today's lesson:

First, you will watch some clips with subtitles,
then we'll teach you all the most

important vocabulary pronunciation and
cultural context,

before you test everything you learn by watching
it a final time without subtitles
and answering some quiz questions.
Plus, we have this FREE PDF and MP3 lesson that

you can download to take your learning
to the next level.
I'll tell you more about that later.
For now, let's watch Harry in his first class with Professor Snape.
